name: Alexandra Kim
persona: Alexandra Kim is a 20-year-old biology major with a CGPA of 3.37. She is highly motivated to achieve good grades and consistently puts in the effort needed to succeed, even when faced with challenges. Alexandra tends to stay organized and disciplined, although she sometimes experiences moderate anxiety before exams. Her perseverance and belief in her academic abilities help her overcome obstacles and keep her focused on her long-term goals in science.
